channel.title: How Can I Fix This? [Rep++]
channel.description:
Project SJ is loading... java.io.FileNotFoundException: C:\Project SJ\Maps\mapConfig.txt(The system cannot find the file specified) at java.io.FileInputStream.open(Native Method) at java.io.FileInputStream.<init>(FileInputStream.java:138) at java.io.FileInputStream.<init>(FileInputStream.java:97) at java.io.FileReader.<init>(FileReader.java:58) at client.setNewMaps(client.java:182) at client.startUp(client.java:9440) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:33) at client.run.(client.java:6328) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:722) Loading 525 graphics... Loading Compressed Models... Loading animations Loaded the flo. 602 NPC Amount: 11257
How can i fix the file not found thing ^

item.title: How Can I Fix This? [Rep++]
item.dc:creator: @LearningToCode1 LearningToCode1
item.description:
@LearningToCode1 wrote:

Your cache need to go into the C: part of your computer so the maps can load properly

Read full topic

item.title: How Can I Fix This? [Rep++]
item.dc:creator: @whackatre Whackatre
item.description:
@whackatre wrote:

[quote=“Aaronthetank, post:5, topic:446230”]im not good at doing these kinds of things thats why im asking… but ill try it thanks ill say if worked or not… so i make a mapconfig.txt and then put what in it? the map?

also what about all the at things under it…?[/quote]

The cache should download and unzip into the specified location, is the map data not included in your cache?

Read full topic

item.title: How Can I Fix This? [Rep++]
item.dc:creator: @Aaronthetank Aaronthetank
item.description:

item.title: How Can I Fix This? [Rep++]
item.dc:creator: @whackatre Whackatre
item.description:
@whackatre wrote:

Aaronthetank:

How do i put in the file specified?

Inside the folder ‘C:\Project SJ\Maps’, place mapConfig.txt and any other necessary files.

I don’t know what your server is, you figure out what you’re using.

Read full topic
